name: The Swords of Ditto
description: The Swords of Ditto is a roguelite action RPG that creates a unique adventure for each new hero of legend in the relentless fight against the evil Mormo.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 x86/x64 Processor: Intel Core i5-3210M (2 * 2500) or equivalent Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD 4000 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 1 GB available space Additional Notes: Some integrated cards have an issue with memory and may not launch the game
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 x64 Processor: Intel Pentium G3250 (2 * 3200) or AMD Phenom 9850 Quad-Core (4 * 2500) or equivalent Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 460 (1024 MB) or Radeon HD 6850 (1024 MB) DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 1 GB available space
